content: lars & the real girl blanket by tanis gray & louisa demmitt materials 8 balls be sweet bamboo 1 75oz/50g ea approx/ 110yds/100m 100% hand dyed bamboo in #626 silver mint size us 5 3 75mm 30 circular knitting needles tapestry needle gauge 18 sts and 21 row/4 in lace pattern blocked gauge is not imperative for this blanket approximate finished size 36 x 36 abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 sts together as one st p purl ssk slip one st as if to knit slip another st as if to knit insert left-hand needle into front of these 2 sts and knit them together yo yarn over lace pattern row 1 and 3 rs k2 k2tog k5 yo k1 yo k5 ssk twelve times k2 row 2 and 4 ws k2 purl to last 2 sts k2 row 5 6 7 8 9 and 10 knit across repeat row 1-10 for lace pattern instructions co 184 sts knit 4 row garter st begin chart working row 1-10 23 times or until desired length is reached chart is worked 12 times across row knit 4 row garter st bobble loosely weave in all loose ends with tapestry needle block well © 2015 tanis gray & louisa demmitt page one lars & the real girl blanket by tanis gray & louisa demmitt © 2015 tanis gray & louisa demmitt page two
